Uses of Class
com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport.SetInfo

  • Packages that use SetInfo 
    Package Description
    com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.adapter
    Contains an interface whose methods can be called by an external data subset creation service or an external data subset locator to retrieve data from an external data source.
    com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice
    An i2 Analyze external data subset creation service provides users with the ability to perform search and expand operations against an appropriately configured external data provider through the Intelligence Portal user interface.
    com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetexplorationservice
    An i2 Analyze external data subset exploration service provides clients with the ability to retrieve information from a subset of data that has been created from an external data provider.
    com.i2group.apollo.searchservice
    The standard i2 Analyze search service provides clients with the ability to perform searches of various types against the latest versions of data, and to retrieve scored search results.

    Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.
    com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport
    Contains classes for the services that search for items in the Analysis Repository and external data sources.

    • Uses of SetInfo in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.adapter

      Methods in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.adapter with parameters of type SetInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Source IExternalDataAdapter.search(String searchString, SetInfo setInfo, ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds, FilterInfoList filterInfos)
      Searches the external data source for information that meets a range of criteria, and returns a Source that contains the results.

    • Uses of SetInfo in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice

      Methods in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice with parameters of type SetInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier IExternalDataSubsetCreationService.search(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, String searchString, SetInfo setInfo, ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds, FilterInfoList filterInfos)
      Searches an external data provider for Items that meet a range of criteria, creates an external data subset from the results, and populates an ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier with information about that subset.

    • Uses of SetInfo in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetexplorationservice

      Methods in com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetexplorationservice with parameters of type SetInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SearchSummary IExternalDataSubsetExplorationService.search(ExternalDataSubsetIdentifier subsetIdentifier, String searchString, SetInfo setInfo, ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds, FilterInfoList filterInfos)
      Searches the specified external data subset for Items that meet a range of criteria, returning a SearchSummary.

    • Uses of SetInfo in com.i2group.apollo.searchservice

      Methods in com.i2group.apollo.searchservice with parameters of type SetInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SearchSummary ISearchService.search(String searchString, SetInfo setInfo, ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds, FilterInfoList filterInfos)
      Searches the Analysis Repository or an ELP stage for Items that meet a range of criteria, returning a SearchSummary.
      SearchResults ISearchService.searchAndRetrieve(String searchString, SetInfo setInfo, ItemTypeIdList itemTypeIds, FilterInfoList filterInfos, SortInfo sortInfo, int maxResultCount, PageInfo pageInfo)
      Performs a one-step search and retrieve operation, combining the functionality of search and retrieve into a single call.

    • Uses of SetInfo in com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport

      Methods in com.i2group.apollo.searchservice.transport that return SetInfo 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SetInfo SetScopeFilter.getSetInfo()
      Gets a SetInfo describing the set whose contents the SearchNode will match against.

      Constructor and Description
